meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Christine Heely Ron Abbott Steven Popper Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #833.

td.p: Christine Heely, an attorney originally from St. Louis
Ron Abbott, a telemarketer from Sherman Oaks, California
Steven Popper, an economist originally from Minneapolis, Minnesota (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,700)

tr.td: ZOOLOGY
LEGAL LINGO
F. SCOTT FITZGERALD
STAMPS & COINS
CHARACTERS IN MUSICALS
"Y" NOT?
